DOC.brief_summary: To establish safety performance AqueSys XEN 45 Glaucoma Implant eye refractory glaucoma .
DOC.brief_title: AqueSys XEN 45 Glaucoma Implant Refractory Glaucoma
DOC.detailed_description: A prospective , multi-center , single arm , open-label clinical trial evaluate safety IOP lower performance AqueSys XEN 45 Glaucoma Implant refractory glaucoma patient .
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis Refractory Glaucoma Maximallytolerated medicate IOP two preoperative visit ≥20 mmHg ≤35 mmHg Visual field mean deviation score 3 dB bad Shaffer Angle Grade ≥ 3 Area free , healthy mobile conjunctiva target quadrant Active Neovascular Glaucoma Previous glaucoma shunt/valve target quadrant History corneal surgery , opacity disease/pathology Anticipated need ocular surgery Nonstudy eye BCVA 20/200 worse
